answers.answer: I will be 15 weeks on Friday, I have lost almost 10 pounds as well! I was not able to keep much food down, and with all the nausea I couldn't eat anything. I'm able to eat a little more now but I have have nausea!

I'll be 14 weeks Friday and I lost 4 pounds. My doctor said It's perfectly normal! I also have a belly going on, most of It's bloating. Depending on the hour of the day I either just look fat or 6 months pregnant lol

I lost 20 pounds with my first child and she is fine and I have lost almost 10 with this one. It's normal to lose weight. Maybe not 20 pounds lol. If your staying sick or not eating enough because of feeling sick it could be that.

Ive lost 4 pounds and im 14 weeks, my doctor recommended drinking ensure or boost drinks because they have vitamins and calories to gain back the pounds but she didnt seem too concerned since a lot of ladies lose weight from morning sickness in their first trimester

I have gestational  diabetes and with the diet they have me on I have lost weight and so did my cousin. ..she lost 20 total I have lost 12 I'm 4 months now bit dr said it's fine its just the diet I'm on I'm eating healthier and baby is great so I don't think it's a horrible thing I mean how often do women come out of pregnancy smaller. ..lol oh by the way I look 5 to 6 months also in sure your dr would tell you if your endangering you're baby if so

I have gestational  diabetes and with the diet they have me on I have lost weight and so did my cousin. ..she lost 20 total I have lost 12 I'm 4 months now bit dr said it's fine its just the diet I'm on I'm eating healthier and baby is great so I don't think it's a horrible thing I mean how often do women come out of pregnancy smaller. ..lol oh by the way I look 5 to 6 months also in sure your dr would tell you if your endangering you're baby if so

question: I am 15 weeks and I saw my doctor today. I have lost 8 pounds since 4 weeks ago which she didn't seem happy about. And I don't understandhow bc I look 6 months pregnant!! Anyone else have this happen?? should I be worried?? Also my urine was positive for glucose. That is also scaring me. :(
title: concerned mama
